body: It says `Command "brew reinstall xcodegen" didn't complete successfully, exiting with code 1.: Command "brew reinstall xcodegen" didn't complete successfully`, just try to reinstall xcodegen again?
Same thing here. $ brew reinstall xcodegen works fine.  Running xcodegen from the command line works fine. There is something wrong with the "yarn tauri ios init" command
I can confirm this happens on M2 too.

issue.title: [bug] iOS init with node package manager fails to detect required dependency exist

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

repository.name: tauri
repository.description: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop and mobile applications with a web frontend.

issue.body:
### Describe the bug

Failed to run `pnpm tauri ios init`

**Error Message**
```sh
> recipies@0.0.0 tauri /Users/jason/Documents/tauri-docs/recipies
> tauri "ios" "init"

/Users/jason/Documents/tauri-apps/tauri/tooling/cli/node
use remote
        # don't mind this, I am tracking down this issue
        Info "/Users/jason/Documents/tauri-docs/recipies/node_modules/.bin/../../../../tauri-apps/tauri/tooling/cli/node/tauri.js" relative to "/Users/jason/Documents/tauri-docs/recipies/src-tauri/gen/apple" is "../../../node_modules/.bin/../../../../tauri-apps/tauri/tooling/cli/node/tauri.js" 
        Info detected rustc version 1.75.0 (82e1608df 2023-12-21)
        Info package `xcodegen` present: false
Installing `xcodegen`...
       Error failed to install Apple dependencies: Failed to install `xcodegen`: command ["brew", "reinstall", "xcodegen"] exited with code 1: command ["brew", "reinstall", "xcodegen"] exited with code 1
```

- Run with `cargo tauri ios init` is good; `pnpm`, `npm`, `yarn` failed, suspecting only node cli binary has the issue
- All happens when executing `duct::cmd(...).run()`
  - Some commands are fine, like `cd`, `rustc --version (why)`
  - Most of the command return with exited code 1: `echo`, `command`, `xcodegen`, `brew`
  - However, using `duct::cmd` with `capture_stdout().run()` will success

### Reproduction

1. Create Tauri app with CTA `pnpm create tauri-app --beta`
2. `pnpm install` then `pnpm tauri ios init`

### Expected behavior

Run `pnpm tauri ios init` successfully

### Full `tauri info` output

```text
[✔] Environment
    - OS: Mac OS 14.3.1 X64
    ✔ Xcode Command Line Tools: installed
    ✔ rustc: 1.76.0 (07dca489a 2024-02-04)
    ✔ cargo: 1.76.0 (c84b36747 2024-01-18)
    ✔ rustup: 1.26.0 (5af9b9484 2023-04-05)
    ✔ Rust toolchain: stable-aarch64-apple-darwin (default)
    - node: 20.11.1
    - pnpm: 8.14.1
    - yarn: 1.22.19
    - npm: 10.2.4
    - bun: 1.0.26

[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.3
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.2
    - wry [RUST]: 0.36.0
    - tao [RUST]: 0.25.0
    - tauri-cli [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.2
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.1
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.3

[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - frontendDist: ../dist
    - devUrl: http://localhost:1420/
    - framework: Vue.js
    - bundler: Vite
```


### Stack trace

_No response_

### Additional context

Discord support: https://discord.com/channels/616186924390023171/1209297064505376898

body: I'm working on the fix for this. Will be released today.

issue.title: fix: dup stdout/stderr to spawn processes on NAPI contexts
issue.body:
A recent [duct change](https://github.com/oconnor663/duct.rs/commit/bb6a599bf99fcd5f58cfc6f5da051a8dbe9c5d1a) breaks cargo-mobile2 usage on NAPI contexts. We rely on the dup stdout/stdio/stderr otherwise process spawning fails on Node.js bindings.

Bug report: https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/issues/6203

body:
It looks like the tauri CLI included in package.json by the project creator has not been updated to 2.0.
Try using this:

```json
  "devDependencies": {
    "@tauri-apps/cli": ">=2.0.0-beta.0",
  }
```

I figured it out by looking at https://github.com/atilafassina/quantum/blob/main/package.json based on this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W539_PP4Y98

issue.title: [bug] Tauri 2.0 beta project generator fails with tauri commands due to invalid CLI version

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

repository.name: tauri
repository.description: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop and mobile applications with a web frontend.

issue.body:
### Describe the bug

After having created a tauri 2.0 beta project for mobile, the `tauri ios init` command failed as per this [issue](https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/issues/6203#issuecomment-1996097107)

This was due to `package.json` dev dependency having tauri CLI set to 1.x. It works when updated to 2.x as demonstrated by this [demo project](https://github.com/atilafassina/quantum/blob/main/package.json)

### Reproduction

```bash
> bun tauri ios init
       Error [tauri_cli::helpers::config] `tauri.conf.json` error on `build`: Additional properties are not allowed ('devUrl', 'frontendDist' were unexpected)
       Error [tauri_cli::helpers::config] `tauri.conf.json` error: Additional properties are not allowed ('app', 'bundle', 'identifier', 'productName', 'version' were unexpected)
```

### Expected behavior

`tauri` commands such as `tauri ios init` should work after generating a project using official starter guide with `--beta` option

### Full `tauri info` output

```text
[✔] Environment
    - OS: Mac OS 14.2.1 X64
    ✔ Xcode Command Line Tools: installed
    ✔ rustc: 1.76.0 (07dca489a 2024-02-04)
    ✔ cargo: 1.76.0 (c84b36747 2024-01-18)
    ✔ rustup: 1.27.0 (bbb9276d2 2024-03-08)
    ✔ Rust toolchain: stable-aarch64-apple-darwin (default)
    - node: 18.12.1
    - pnpm: 8.6.3
    - yarn: 1.22.19
    - npm: 8.19.2
    - bun: 1.0.30

[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.11
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.9
    - wry [RUST]: 0.37.0
    - tao [RUST]: 0.26.1
    - tauri-cli [RUST]: 1.5.11
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.5
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.9

[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - frontendDist: ../dist
    - devUrl: http://localhost:1420/
    - framework: Svelte
    - bundler: Vite

[-] iOS
    - Developer Teams: None
```


### Stack trace

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
